TITLE: Setting up SqlKata Database Connection
DESCRIPTION: Initializes a database connection using SqlKata's QueryFactory with SQL Server
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var connection = new SqlConnection("...");
var compiler = new SqlCompiler();
var db = new QueryFactory(connection, compiler);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Inserting Records
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to insert new records into a table
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
int affected = db.Query("Users").Insert(new {
    Name = "Jane",
    CountryId = 1
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Records
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to update existing records with Where clause
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
int affected = db.Query("Users").Where("Id", 1).Update(new {
    Name = "Jane",
    CountryId = 1
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deleting Records
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to delete records with a Where clause
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
int affected = db.Query("Users").Where("Id", 1).Delete();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Record Retrieval in SqlKata
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates retrieving all records from a table using SqlKata's query builder
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var books = db.Query("Books").Get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Pagination
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to implement pagination using SqlKata's Paginate method
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var page1 = db.Query("Books").Paginate(10);

foreach(var book in page1.List)
{
    Console.WriteLine(book.Name);
}

...

var page2 = page1.Next();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Related Data
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to include related data from another table using Include method
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var books = db.Query("Books")
    .Include(db.Query("Authors")) // Assumes that the Books table has an `AuthorId` column
    .Get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Table Joining with Column Selection
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to join tables and select specific columns with aliases
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var books = db.Query("Books")
    .Join("Authors", "Authors.Id", "Books.AuthorId")
    .Select("Books.*", "Authors.Name as AuthorName")
    .Get();

foreach(var book in books)
{
    Console.WriteLine($"{book.Title}: {book.AuthorName}");
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Conditional Query Building
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to build queries with conditional clauses using When method
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var isFriday = DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Friday;

var books = db.Query("Books")
    .When(isFriday, q => q.WhereIn("Category", new [] {"OpenSource", "MachineLearning"}))
    .Get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Single Record Retrieval with Multiple Conditions
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves a single record using multiple Where clauses
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var introToSql = db.Query("Books").Where("Id", 145).Where("Lang", "en").First();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Recent Records with Limit
DESCRIPTION: Retrieves the most recent records with ordering and limit
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var recent = db.Query("Books").OrderByDesc("PublishedAt").Limit(10).Get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Filtering Published Books
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to filter records based on a boolean condition
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
var books = db.Query("Books").WhereTrue("IsPublished").Get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing SqlKata Packages via .NET CLI
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the core SqlKata package and optional execution package using the .NET CLI
SOURCE: https://github.com/sqlkata/querybuilder/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$ dotnet add package SqlKata
$ dotnet add package SqlKata.Execution # (optional) If you want the execution support
```
